title: Colchester 'triple murder': Three men found dead at home after reports of a fight
text:

A murder probe has been launched after three men were found dead at a home in Colchester, Essex.

The bodies were discovered in the early hours of the morning after reports of an altercation.

Two victims were found inside the home, while the body of a third man was found in a car outside the home.

Essex Police were called at around 10.15pm last night.

Officers found two men dead inside the property and the body of a third man in a car outside.

A 32-year-old man from Colchester has been arrested on suspicion of murder.

In a statement Essex Police said: "Detectives are not looking for anyone else in connection with the incident, but are keeping an open mind.

"They would like to speak to anyone who was in or around the Wellesley Road area between 6pm on Saturday 5 October and 1am on Sunday 6 October and witnessed any suspicious or unusual behaviour."

Forensics officers are at the scene of the incident.

It is expected a police cordon could be in place for several days, Essex Live reports.

A police statement said: "Detectives have launched a murder investigation after three men were found deceased at an address on Wellesley Road, Colchester during the early hours of Sunday 6 October.

"We were called around 10.15pm on Saturday 5 October, with concerns for the welfare of two men at an address on Wellesley Road following reports of an altercation.

"Officers attended and found two men dead inside the property and the body of a third man in a car outside the property."

"A 32-year-old man from Colchester has been arrested on suspicion of murder.

"Detectives are not looking for anyone else in connection with the incident, but are keeping an open mind.

"They would like to speak to anyone who was in or around the Wellesley Road area between 6pm on Saturday 5 October and 1am on Sunday 6 October and witnessed any suspicious or unusual behaviour.

"If you have any information, please contact our Major Crime Team on 101 quoting incident 1400 of 5 October or email scd.appeals.essex@essex.pnn.police.uk."

We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
description: Two men were found dead inside the home, while another was in a car outside following report of fight
